(Kilt wearing dog, you shall fall at the hands of Taka--errr, wrong RPG...)



Unitron:




Unitron laughed at Hot Rod's obvious confusion.  "There were Predacons in the 
Third Cybertronian War, Autobot, but true not as they are now.  I'm from the 
time before the revolt against the Quintessons, and the victory for the glory 
of all Cybertronians at Hive City." he raised his arms to block the kick, and 
pushed forward as hard as he could to try and knock Hot Rod down.
